fields.title: Trouble Brewing
fields.description: Base script for Blood on the Clocktower.
fields.author: Blood on the Clocktower

fields.title: Bad Moon Rising
fields.description: Base script for Blood on the Clocktower.
fields.author: Blood on the Clocktower

fields.title: Sects & Violets
fields.description: Base script for Blood on the Clocktower.
fields.author: Blood on the Clocktower

fields.name: Washerwoman
fields.desc1: You start knowing that 1 of 2 players
fields.desc2: is a particular Townsfolk.
fields.night_first_desc: Show the character token of a Townsfolk in play. Point to two players, one of which is that character.

fields.name: Librarian
fields.desc1: You start knowing that 1 of 2 players
fields.desc2: is a particular Outsider. (Or that zero are in play.)
fields.night_first_desc: Show the character token of an Outsider in play. Point to two players, one of which is that character.

fields.name: Investigator
fields.desc1: You start knowing that 1 of 2 players
fields.desc2: is a particular Minion.
fields.night_first_desc: Show the character token of a Minion in play. Point to two players, one of which is that character.

fields.name: Chef
fields.desc1: You start knowing how many pairs
fields.desc2: of evil players there are.
fields.night_first_desc: Show the finger signal (0, 1, 2, ...) for the number of pairs of neighbouring evil players.

fields.name: Empath
fields.desc1: Each night, you learn how many
fields.desc2: of your 2 alive neighbors are evil.
fields.night_first_desc: Show the finger signal (0, 1, 2) for the number of evil alive neighbours of the Empath.
fields.night_other_desc: Show the finger signal (0, 1, 2) for the number of evil alive neighbours of the Empath.

fields.name: Fortune Teller
fields.desc1: Each night, choose 2 players: you learn if either is a Demon.
fields.desc2: There is 1 good player that registers as a Demon to you.
fields.night_first_desc: The Fortune Teller points to two players. Give the head signal (nod yes, shake no) for whether one of those players is the Demon.
fields.night_other_desc: The Fortune Teller points to two players. Give the head signal (nod yes, shake no) for whether one of those players is the Demon.

fields.name: Undertaker
fields.desc1: Each night*, you learn which character
fields.desc2: died by execution today.
fields.night_other_desc: If a player was executed today: Show that player's character token.

fields.name: Monk
fields.desc1: Each night*, choose a player (not yourself):
fields.desc2: they are safe from the Demon tonight.
fields.night_other_desc: The previously protected player is no longer protected. The Monk points to a player not themselves. Mark that player 'Protected'.

fields.name: Ravenkeeper
fields.desc1: If you die at night, you are woken to choose a player:
fields.desc2: you learn their character.
fields.night_other_desc: If the Ravenkeeper died tonight: The Ravenkeeper points to a player. Show that player's character token.

fields.name: Virgin
fields.desc1: The 1st time you are nominated, if the nominator
fields.desc2: is a Townsfolk, they are executed immediately.

fields.name: Slayer
fields.desc1: Once per game, during the day, publicly choose a player:
fields.desc2: if they are the Demon, they die.

fields.name: Soldier
fields.desc1: You are safe
fields.desc2: from the Demon.

fields.name: Mayor
fields.desc1: If only 3 players live & no execution occurs, your team
fields.desc2: wins. If you die at night, another player might die instead.

fields.name: Butler
fields.desc1: Each night, choose a player (not yourself):
fields.desc2: tomorrow, you may only vote if they are voting too.
fields.night_first_desc: The Butler points to a player. Mark that player as 'Master'.
fields.night_other_desc: The Butler points to a player. Mark that player as 'Master'.

fields.name: Drunk
fields.desc1: You do not know you are the Drunk.
fields.desc2: You think you are a Townsfolk character, but you are not.

fields.name: Recluse
fields.desc1: You might register as evil & as a Minion or Demon,
fields.desc2: even if dead.

fields.name: Saint
fields.desc1: If you die by execution,
fields.desc2: your team loses.

fields.name: Poisoner
fields.desc1: Each night, choose a player:
fields.desc2: they are poisoned tonight and tomorrow day.
fields.night_first_desc: The Poisoner points to a player. That player is poisoned.
fields.night_other_desc: The previously poisoned player is no longer poisoned. The Poisoner points to a player. That player is poisoned.

fields.name: Spy
fields.desc1: Each night, you see the Grimoire. You might register
fields.desc2: as good & as a Townsfolk or Outsider, even if dead.
fields.night_first_desc: Show the Grimoire to the Spy for as long as they need.
fields.night_other_desc: Show the Grimoire to the Spy for as long as they need.

fields.name: Baron
fields.desc1: There are extra Outsiders in play.
fields.desc2: [+2 Outsiders]

fields.name: Scarlet Woman
fields.desc1: If there are 5 or more players alive & the Demon dies,
fields.desc2: you become the Demon. (Travellers don't count)
fields.night_other_desc: If the Scarlet Woman became the Demon today: Show the 'You are' card, then the demon token.

fields.name: Imp
fields.desc1: Each night*, choose a player: they die.
fields.desc2: If you kill yourself this way, a Minion becomes the Imp.
fields.night_other_desc: The Imp points to a player. That player dies. If the Imp chose themselves: Replace the character of 1 alive minion with a spare Imp token. Show the 'You are' card, then the Imp token.

fields.name: Clockmaker
fields.desc1: You start knowing how many steps
fields.desc2: from the Demon to its nearest Minion.
fields.night_first_desc: Show the hand signal for the number (1, 2, 3, etc.) of places from Demon to closest Minion.

fields.name: Dreamer
fields.desc1: Each night, choose a player (not yourself, not Travellers):
fields.desc2: you learn 1 good character & 1 evil character, 1 of which is correct.
fields.night_first_desc: The Dreamer points to a player. Show 1 good and 1 evil character token; one of these is correct.
fields.night_other_desc: The Dreamer points to a player. Show 1 good and 1 evil character token; one of these is correct.

fields.name: Snake Charmer
fields.desc1: Each night, choose an alive player: a chosen Demon swaps
fields.desc2: characters & alignments with you & is then poisoned.
fields.night_first_desc: The Snake Charmer points to a player. If that player is the Demon: swap the Demon and Snake Charmer character and alignments. Wake each player to inform them of their new role and alignment. The new Snake Charmer is poisoned.
fields.night_other_desc: The Snake Charmer points to a player. If that player is the Demon: swap the Demon and Snake Charmer character and alignments. Wake each player to inform them of their new role and alignment. The new Snake Charmer is poisoned.

fields.name: Mathematician
fields.desc1: Each night, you learn how many players' abilities worked
fields.desc2: abnormally (since dawn) due to another character's ability.
fields.night_first_desc: Show the hand signal for the number (0, 1, 2, etc.) of players whose ability malfunctioned due to other abilities.
fields.night_other_desc: Show the hand signal for the number (0, 1, 2, etc.) of players whose ability malfunctioned due to other abilities.

fields.name: Flowergirl
fields.desc1: Each night*, you learn
fields.desc2: if a Demon voted today.
fields.night_other_desc: Nod 'yes' or shake head 'no' for whether the Demon voted today. Place the 'Demon not voted' marker (remove 'Demon voted', if any).

fields.name: Town Crier
fields.desc1: Each night*, you learn
fields.desc2: if a Minion nominated today.
fields.night_other_desc: Nod 'yes' or shake head 'no' for whether a Minion nominated today. Place the 'Minion not nominated' marker (remove 'Minion nominated', if any).

fields.name: Oracle
fields.desc1: Each night*, you learn
fields.desc2: how many dead players are evil.
fields.night_other_desc: Each night*, you learn how many dead players are evil.

fields.name: Savant
fields.desc1: Each day, you may visit the Storyteller to learn 2 things
fields.desc2: in private: 1 is true & 1 is false.

fields.name: Seamstress
fields.desc1: Once per game, at night, choose 2 players (not yourself):
fields.desc2: you learn if they are the same alignment.
fields.night_first_desc: The Seamstress either shows a 'no' head signal, or points to two other players. If the Seamstress chose players , nod 'yes' or shake 'no' for whether they are of same alignment.
fields.night_other_desc: If the Seamstress has not yet used their ability: the Seamstress either shows a 'no' head signal, or points to two other players. If the Seamstress chose players , nod 'yes' or shake 'no' for whether they are of same alignment.

fields.name: Philosopher
fields.desc1: Once per game, at night, choose a good character:
fields.desc2: gain that ability. If this character is in play, they are drunk.
fields.night_first_desc: The Philosopher either shows a 'no' head signal, or points to a good character on their sheet. If they chose a character: Swap the out-of-play character token with the Philosopher token. Or, if the character is in play, place the drunk marker by that player and the Not the Philosopher token by the Philosopher.
fields.night_other_desc: If the Philosopher has not used their ability: the Philosopher either shows a 'no' head signal, or points to a good character on their sheet. If they chose a character: Swap the out-of-play character token with the Philosopher token. Or, if the character is in play, place the drunk marker by that player and the Not the Philosopher token by the Philosopher.

fields.name: Artist
fields.desc1: Once per game, during the day,
fields.desc2: privately ask the Storyteller any yes/no question.

fields.name: Juggler
fields.desc1: On your 1st day, publicly guess up to 5 player's characters.
fields.desc2: That night, you learn how many you got correct.
fields.night_other_desc: If today was the Juggler's first day: Show the hand signal for the number (0, 1, 2, etc.) of 'Correct' markers. Remove markers.

fields.name: Sage
fields.desc1: If the Demon kills you,
fields.desc2: you learn that it is 1 of 2 players.
fields.night_other_desc: If the Sage was killed by a Demon: Point to two players, one of which is that Demon.

fields.name: Mutant
fields.desc1: If you are "mad" about being an Outsider,
fields.desc2: you might be executed.

fields.name: Barber
fields.desc1: If you died today or tonight, the Demon may choose
fields.desc2: 2 players (not another Demon) to swap characters.
fields.night_other_desc: If the Barber died today: Wake the Demon. Show the 'This character selected you' card, then Barber token. The Demon either shows a 'no' head signal, or points to 2 players. If they chose players: Swap the character tokens. Wake each player. Show 'You are', then their new character token.

fields.name: Sweetheart
fields.desc1: When you die,
fields.desc2: 1 player is drunk from now on.
fields.night_other_desc: When you die, 1 player is drunk from now on.

fields.name: Klutz
fields.desc1: When you learn that you died, publicly choose
fields.desc2: 1 alive player: if they are evil, your team loses.

fields.name: Witch
fields.desc1: Each night, choose a player:
fields.desc2: if they nominate tomorrow, they die.
fields.desc3: If just 3 players live, you lose this ability.
fields.night_first_desc: The Witch points to a player. If that player nominates tomorrow they die immediately.
fields.night_other_desc: The Witch points to a player. If that player nominates tomorrow they die immediately.

fields.name: Cerenovus
fields.desc1: Each night, choose a player & a good character:
fields.desc2: they are "mad" they are this character tomorrow,
fields.night_first_desc: The Cerenovus points to a player, then to a character on their sheet. Wake that player. Show the 'This character selected you' card, then the Cerenovus token. Show the selected character token. If the player is not mad about being that character tomorrow, they can be executed.
fields.night_other_desc: The Cerenovus points to a player, then to a character on their sheet. Wake that player. Show the 'This character selected you' card, then the Cerenovus token. Show the selected character token. If the player is not mad about being that character tomorrow, they can be executed.

fields.name: Pit-Hag
fields.desc1: Each night*, choose a player & a character they
fields.desc2: become (if not-in-play). If a Demon is made,
fields.night_other_desc: The Pit-Hag points to a player and a character on the sheet. If this character is not in play, wake that player and show them the 'You are' card and the relevant character token. If the character is in play, nothing happens.

fields.name: Evil Twin
fields.desc1: You & an opposing player know each other.
fields.desc2: If the good player is executed, evil wins.
fields.desc3: Good can't win if you both live.
fields.night_first_desc: Wake the Evil Twin and their twin. Confirm that they have acknowledged each other. Point to the Evil Twin. Show their Evil Twin token to the twin player. Point to the twin. Show their character token to the Evil Twin player.

fields.name: Fang Gu
fields.desc1: Each night*, choose a player: they die. The 1st Outsider
fields.desc2: this kills becomes an evil Fang Gu & you die instead.
fields.night_other_desc: The Fang Gu points to a player. That player dies. Or, if that player was an Outsider and there are no other Fang Gu in play: The Fang Gu dies instead of the chosen player. The chosen player is now an evil Fang Gu. Wake the new Fang Gu. Show the 'You are' card, then the Fang Gu token. Show the 'You are' card, then the thumb-down 'evil' hand sign.

fields.name: No Dashii
fields.desc1: Each night*, choose a player: they die.
fields.desc2: Your 2 Townsfolk neighbors are poisoned.
fields.night_other_desc: The No Dashii points to a player. That player dies.

fields.name: Vigormortis
fields.desc1: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Minions you kill
fields.desc2: keep their ability & poison 1 Townsfolk neighbor.
fields.night_other_desc: The Vigormortis points to a player. That player dies. If a Minion, they keep their ability and one of their Townsfolk neighbours is poisoned.

fields.name: Vortox
fields.desc1: Each night*, choose a player; they die. Townsfolk abilities
fields.desc2: yield false info. Each day, if no-one is executed, evil wins.
fields.night_other_desc: The Vortox points to a player. That player dies.

fields.name: Grandmother
fields.desc1: You start knowing a good player & their character.
fields.desc2: If the Demon kills them, you die too.
fields.night_first_desc: Show the marked character token. Point to the marked player.
fields.night_other_desc: If the Grandmother's grandchild was killed by the Demon tonight: The Grandmother dies.

fields.name: Sailor
fields.desc1: Each night, choose an alive player:
fields.desc2: either you or they are drunk until dusk. You can't die.
fields.night_first_desc: The Sailor points to a living player. Either the Sailor, or the chosen player, is drunk.
fields.night_other_desc: The previously drunk player is no longer drunk. The Sailor points to a living player. Either the Sailor, or the chosen player, is drunk.

fields.name: Chambermaid
fields.desc1: Each night, choose 2 alive players (not yourself):
fields.desc2: you learn how many woke tonight due to their ability.
fields.night_first_desc: The Chambermaid points to two players. Show the number signal (0, 1, 2, ...) for how many of those players wake tonight for their ability.
fields.night_other_desc: The Chambermaid points to two players. Show the number signal (0, 1, 2, ...) for how many of those players wake tonight for their ability.

fields.name: Exorcist
fields.desc1: Each night*, choose a player (different to last night): the Demon,
fields.desc2: if chosen, learns who you are & doesn't wake tonight.
fields.night_other_desc: The Exorcist points to a player, different from the previous night. If that player is the Demon: Wake the Demon. Show the Exorcist token. Point to the Exorcist. The Demon does not act tonight.

fields.name: Innkeeper
fields.desc1: Each night*, choose 2 players:
fields.desc2: they can't die tonight, but 1 is drunk until dusk.
fields.night_other_desc: The previously protected and drunk players lose those markers. The Innkeeper points to two players. Those players are protected. One is drunk.

fields.name: Gambler
fields.desc1: Each night*, choose a player & guess their character:
fields.desc2: if you guess wrong, you die.
fields.night_other_desc: The Gambler points to a player, and a character on their sheet. If incorrect, the Gambler dies.

fields.name: Gossip
fields.desc1: Each day, you may make a public statement.
fields.desc2: Tonight, if it was true, a player dies.
fields.night_other_desc: If the Gossip's public statement was true: Choose a player not protected from dying tonight. That player dies.

fields.name: Courtier
fields.desc1: Once per game, at night, choose a character:
fields.desc2: they are drunk for 3 nights & 3 days.
fields.night_first_desc: The Courtier either shows a 'no' head signal, or points to a character on the sheet. If the Courtier used their ability: If that character is in play, that player is drunk.
fields.night_other_desc: Reduce the remaining number of days the marked player is poisoned. If the Courtier has not yet used their ability: The Courtier either shows a 'no' head signal, or points to a character on the sheet. If the Courtier used their ability: If that character is in play, that player is drunk.

fields.name: Professor
fields.desc1: Once per game, at night*, choose a dead player:
fields.desc2: if they are a Townsfolk, they are resurrected.
fields.night_other_desc: If the Professor has not used their ability: The Professor either shakes their head no, or points to a player. If that player is a Townsfolk, they are now alive.

fields.name: Minstrel
fields.desc1: When a Minion dies by execution, all other players
fields.desc2: (except Travellers) are drunk until dusk tomorrow.

fields.name: Tea Lady
fields.desc1: If both your alive neighbors are good,
fields.desc2: they can't die.

fields.name: Pacifist
fields.desc1: Executed good players
fields.desc2: might not die.

fields.name: Fool
fields.desc1: The 1st time you die,
fields.desc2: you don't.

fields.name: Goon
fields.desc1: Each night, the 1st player to choose you with their ability
fields.desc2: is drunk until dusk. You become their alignment.

fields.name: Lunatic
fields.desc1: You think you are a Demon, but you are not.
fields.desc2: The Demon knows who you are & who you choose at night.
fields.night_first_desc: If 7 or more players: Show the Lunatic a number of arbitrary 'Minions', players equal to the number of Minions in play. Show 3 character tokens of arbitrary good characters. If the token received by the Lunatic is a Demon that would wake tonight: Allow the Lunatic to do the Demon actions. Place their 'attack' markers. Wake the Demon. Show the Demon's real character token. Show them the Lunatic player. If the Lunatic attacked players: Show the real demon each marked player. Remove any Lunatic 'attack' markers.
fields.night_other_desc: Allow the Lunatic to do the actions of the Demon. Place their 'attack' markers. If the Lunatic selected players: Wake the Demon. Show the 'attack' marker, then point to each marked player. Remove any Lunatic 'attack' markers.

fields.name: Tinker
fields.desc1: You might die
fields.desc2: at any time.
fields.night_other_desc: The Tinker might die.

fields.name: Moonchild
fields.desc1: When you learn that you died, publicly choose
fields.desc2: 1 alive player. Tonight, if it was a good player, they die.
fields.night_other_desc: If the Moonchild used their ability to target a player today: If that player is good, they die.

fields.name: Godfather
fields.desc1: You start knowing which Outsiders are in-play. If 1 died today,
fields.desc2: choose a player tonight: they die. [-1 or +1 Outsider]
fields.night_first_desc: Show each of the Outsider tokens in play.
fields.night_other_desc: If an Outsider died today: The Godfather points to a player. That player dies.

fields.name: Devil's Advocate
fields.desc1: Each night, choose a living player (different to last night):
fields.desc2: if executed tomorrow, they don't die.
fields.night_first_desc: The Devil's Advocate points to a living player. That player survives execution tomorrow.
fields.night_other_desc: The Devil's Advocate points to a living player, different from the previous night. That player survives execution tomorrow.

fields.name: Assassin
fields.desc1: Once per game, at night*, choose a player: they die,
fields.desc2: even if for some reason they could not.
fields.night_other_desc: If the Assassin has not yet used their ability: The Assassin either shows the 'no' head signal, or points to a player. That player dies.

fields.name: Mastermind
fields.desc1: If the Demon dies by execution (ending the game), play for
fields.desc2: 1 more day. If a player is then executed, their team loses.

fields.name: Zombuul
fields.desc1: Each night*, if no-one died today, choose a player: they die.
fields.desc2: The 1st time you die, you live but register as dead.
fields.night_other_desc: If no-one died during the day: The Zombuul points to a player. That player dies.

fields.name: Pukka
fields.desc1: Each night, choose a player: they are poisoned.
fields.desc2: The previously poisoned player dies then becomes healthy.
fields.night_first_desc: The Pukka points to a player. That player is poisoned.
fields.night_other_desc: The Pukka points to a player. That player is poisoned. The previously poisoned player dies.

fields.name: Shabaloth
fields.desc1: Each night*, choose 2 players: they die.
fields.desc2: A dead player you chose last night might be regurgitated.
fields.night_other_desc: One player that the Shabaloth chose the previous night might be resurrected. The Shabaloth points to two players. Those players die.

fields.name: Po
fields.desc1: Each night*, you may choose a player: they die.
fields.desc2: If your last choice was no-one, choose 3 players tonight.
fields.night_other_desc: If the Po chose no-one the previous night: The Po points to three players. Otherwise: The Po either shows the 'no' head signal , or points to a player. Chosen players die.

fields.name: Amnesiac
fields.desc1: You do not know what your ability is. Each day,
fields.desc2: privately guess what it is: you learn how accurate you are.
fields.night_first_desc: Decide the Amnesiac's entire ability. If the Amnesiac's ability causes them to wake tonight: Wake the Amnesiac and run their ability.
fields.night_other_desc: If the Amnesiac's ability causes them to wake tonight: Wake the Amnesiac and run their ability.

fields.name: Balloonist
fields.desc1: Each night, you learn 1 player of each character type,
fields.desc2: until there are no more types to learn. [+1 Outsider]
fields.night_first_desc: Choose a character type. Point to a player whose character is of that type. Place the Balloonist's Seen reminder next to that character.
fields.night_other_desc: Choose a character type that does not yet have a Seen reminder next to a character of that type. Point to a player whose character is of that type, if there are any. Place the Balloonist's Seen reminder next to that character.

fields.name: Bounty Hunter
fields.desc1: You start knowing 1 evil player. If the evil player you know
fields.desc2: dies, you learn another that night. [1 Townsfolk is evil]
fields.night_first_desc: Point to 1 evil player. Wake the townsfolk who is evil and show them the 'You are' card and the thumbs down evil sign.
fields.night_other_desc: If the known evil player has died, point to another evil player.

fields.name: Cannibal
fields.desc1: You have the ability of the recently killed executee. If they
fields.desc2: are evil, you are poisoned until a good player dies by execution.

fields.name: Choirboy
fields.desc1: If the Demon kills the King, you learn
fields.desc2: which player the Demon is. [+ the King]
fields.night_other_desc: If the King was killed by the Demon, wake the Choirboy and point to the Demon player.

fields.name: Cult Leader
fields.desc1: Each night, you become the alignment of an alive neighbor.
fields.desc2: If all good players choose to join your cult, you win.
fields.night_first_desc: If the cult leader changed alignment, show them the thumbs up good signal of the thumbs down evil signal accordingly.
fields.night_other_desc: If the cult leader changed alignment, show them the thumbs up good signal of the thumbs down evil signal accordingly.

fields.name: Farmer
fields.desc1: If you die at night,
fields.desc2: an alive good player becomes a Farmer.
fields.night_other_desc: If a Farmer died tonight, choose another good player and make them the Farmer. Wake this player, show them the 'You are' card and the Farmer character token.

fields.name: Fisherman
fields.desc1: Once per game, during the day,
fields.desc2: visit the Storyteller for some advice to help you win.

fields.name: General
fields.desc1: Each night, you learn which alignment the
fields.desc2: Storyteller believes is winning: good, evil, or neither.
fields.night_first_desc: Show the General thumbs up for good winning, thumbs down for evil winning or thumb to the side for neither.
fields.night_other_desc: Show the General thumbs up for good winning, thumbs down for evil winning or thumb to the side for neither.

fields.name: Huntsman
fields.desc1: Once per game, at night, choose a living player:
fields.desc2: the Damsel, if chosen, becomes a not-in-play Townsfolk.
fields.night_first_desc: The Huntsman shakes their head 'no' or points to a player. If they point to the Damsel, wake that player, show the 'You are' card and a not-in-play character token.
fields.night_other_desc: The Huntsman shakes their head 'no' or points to a player. If they point to the Damsel, wake that player, show the 'You are' card and a not-in-play character token.

fields.name: King
fields.desc1: Each night, if the dead outnumber the living, you learn
fields.desc2: 1 alive character. The Demon knows who you are.
fields.night_first_desc: Wake the Demon, show them the 'This character selected you' card, show the King token and point to the King player.
fields.night_other_desc: If there are more dead than living, show the King a character token of a living player.

fields.name: Lycanthrope
fields.desc1: Each night*, choose an alive player: if good,
fields.desc2: they die, but they are the only player that can die tonight.
fields.night_other_desc: The Lycanthrope points to a living player: if good, they die and no one else can die tonight.

fields.name: Magician
fields.desc1: The Demon thinks you are a Minion.
fields.desc2: Minions think you are a Demon.

fields.name: Noble
fields.desc1: 1 and only 1 of which is evil.
fields.night_first_desc: Point to 3 players including one evil player, in no particular order.

fields.name: Pixie
fields.desc1: You start knowing 1 in-play Townsfolk. If you
fields.desc2: were mad that you were this character,
fields.desc3: you gain their ability when they die.
fields.night_first_desc: Show the Pixie 1 in-play Townsfolk character token.

fields.name: Poppy Grower
fields.desc1: Minions & Demons do not know each other.
fields.desc2: If you die, they learn who each other are that night.
fields.night_first_desc: Do not inform the Demon/Minions who each other are.
fields.night_other_desc: If the Poppy Grower has died, show the Minions/Demon who each other are.

fields.name: Preacher
fields.desc1: Each night, choose a player: a Minion, if chosen,
fields.desc2: learns this. All chosen Minions have no ability.
fields.night_first_desc: The Preacher chooses a player. If a Minion is chosen, wake the Minion and show the 'This character selected you' card and then the Preacher token.
fields.night_other_desc: The Preacher chooses a player. If a Minion is chosen, wake the Minion and show the 'This character selected you' card and then the Preacher token.

fields.name: Acrobat
fields.desc1: Each night*, if either good living neighbor
fields.desc2: is drunk or poisoned, you die.
fields.night_other_desc: If a good living neighbour is drunk or poisoned, the Acrobat player dies.

fields.name: Damsel
fields.desc1: All Minions know you are in play. If a Minion
fields.desc2: publicly guesses you (once), your team loses.
fields.night_first_desc: Wake all the Minions, show them the 'This character selected you' card and the Damsel token.
fields.night_other_desc: If selected by the Huntsman, wake the Damsel, show 'You are' card and a not-in-play Townsfolk token.

fields.name: Golem
fields.desc1: You many only nominate once per game.
fields.desc2: When you do, if the nominee is not the Demon, they die.

fields.name: Heretic
fields.desc1: Whoever wins, loses & whoever loses, wins,
fields.desc2: even if you are dead.

fields.name: Politician
fields.desc1: If you were the player most responsible for
fields.desc2: your team losing, you change alignment & win,

fields.name: Snitch
fields.desc1: Minions start knowing 3
fields.desc2: not-in-play characters.
fields.night_first_desc: After Minion info wake each Minion and show them three not-in-play character tokens. These may be the same or different to each other and the ones shown to the Demon.

fields.name: Boomdandy
fields.desc1: If you are executed, all but 3 players die.
fields.desc2: 1 minute later, the player with the most players

fields.name: Goblin
fields.desc1: If you publicly claim to be the Goblin
fields.desc2: when nominated & are executed that day,

fields.name: Marionette
fields.desc1: You think you are a good character, but you are not.
fields.desc2: The Demon knows who you are.
fields.night_first_desc: Select one of the good players next to the Demon and place the Is the Marionette reminder token. Wake the Demon and show them the Marionette.

fields.name: Mezepheles
fields.desc1: You start knowing a secret word. The 1st good player
fields.desc2: to say this word becomes evil that night.
fields.night_first_desc: Show the Mezepheles their secret word.
fields.night_other_desc: Wake the 1st good player that said the Mezepheles' secret word and show them the 'You are' card and the thumbs down evil signal.

fields.name: Widow
fields.desc1: On your 1st night, look at the Grimoire &
fields.desc2: choose a player: they are poisoned.
fields.desc3: 1 good player knows a Widow is in play.
fields.night_first_desc: Show the Grimoire to the Widow for as long as they need. The Widow points to a player. That player is poisoned. Wake a good player. Show the 'These characters are in play' card, then the Widow character token.

fields.name: Al-Hadikhia
fields.desc1: Each night*, choose 3 players (all players learn who):
fields.desc2: each silently chooses to live or die,
fields.desc3: but if all live, all die.
fields.night_other_desc: The Al-Hadikhia chooses 3 players. Announce the first player, wake them to nod yes to live or shake head no to die, kill or resurrect accordingly, then put to sleep and announce the next player. If all 3 are alive after this, all 3 die.

fields.name: Legion
fields.desc1: Each night*, a player might die. Executions fail if
fields.desc2: only evil voted. You register as a Minion too.
fields.night_other_desc: Each night*, a player might die. Executions fail if only evil voted. You register as a Minion too. [Most players are Legion]

fields.name: Leviathan
fields.desc1: If more than 1 good player is executed,
fields.desc2: evil wins. All players know you are in play.

fields.name: Lil' Monsta
fields.desc1: Each night, Minions choose who babysits Lil' Monsta's token
fields.desc2: & "is the Demon". A player dies each night*.
fields.night_first_desc: Wake all Minions together, allow them to vote by pointing at who they want to babysit Lil' Monsta.
fields.night_other_desc: Wake all Minions together, allow them to vote by pointing at who they want to babysit Lil' Monsta. Choose a player, that player dies.

fields.name: Lleech
fields.desc1: Each night*, choose a player: they die. You start by
fields.desc2: choosing an alive player: they are poisoned -
fields.desc3: you die if(& only if) they die.
fields.night_first_desc: The Lleech points to a player. Place the Poisoned reminder token.
fields.night_other_desc: Each night*, choose a player: they die. You start by choosing an alive player: they are poisoned - you die if & only if they die.

fields.name: Scapegoat
fields.desc1: If a player of your alignment is executed,
fields.desc2: you might be executed instead.

fields.name: Gunslinger
fields.desc1: Each day, after the 1st vote has been tallied,
fields.desc2: you may choose a player that voted: they die.

fields.name: Beggar
fields.desc1: You must use a vote token to vote.
fields.desc2: If a dead player gives you theirs, you learn
fields.desc3: their alignment. You are sober & healthy.

fields.name: Bureaucrat
fields.desc1: Each night, choose a player (not yourself):
fields.desc2: their vote counts as 3 votes tomorrow.
fields.night_first_desc: The Bureaucrat points to a player. Put the Bureaucrat's '3 votes' reminder by the chosen player's character token.
fields.night_other_desc: The Bureaucrat points to a player. Put the Bureaucrat's '3 votes' reminder by the chosen player's character token.

fields.name: Thief
fields.desc1: Each night, choose a player (not yourself):
fields.desc2: their vote counts negatively tomorrow.
fields.night_first_desc: The Thief points to a player. Put the Thief's 'Negative vote' reminder by the chosen player's character token.
fields.night_other_desc: The Thief points to a player. Put the Thief's 'Negative vote' reminder by the chosen player's character token.

fields.name: Apprentice
fields.desc1: On your 1st night, you gain
fields.desc2: a Townsfolk ability (if good),
fields.night_first_desc: Show the Apprentice the 'You are' card, then a Townsfolk or Minion token. In the Grimoire, replace the Apprentice token with that character token, and put the Apprentice's 'Is the Apprentice' reminder by that character token.

fields.name: Matron
fields.desc1: Each day, you may choose up to 3 sets of
fields.desc2: 2 players to swap seats. Players may not
fields.desc3: leave their seats to talk in private.

fields.name: Voudon
fields.desc1: Only you & the dead can vote. They don't need
fields.desc2: a vote token to do so. A 50% majority isn't required.

fields.name: Judge
fields.desc1: Once per game, if another player nominated,
fields.desc2: you may choose to force the current execution

fields.name: Bishop
fields.desc1: Only the Storyteller can nominate. At least
fields.desc2: 1 opposing player must be nominated each day.

fields.name: Butcher
fields.desc1: Each day, after the 1st execution,
fields.desc2: you may nominate again.

fields.name: Bone Collector
fields.desc1: Once per game, at night*, choose a dead player:
fields.desc2: they regain their ability until dusk.
fields.night_other_desc: The Bone Collector either shakes their head no or points at any dead player. If they pointed at any dead player, put the Bone Collector's 'Has Ability' reminder by the chosen player's character token. (They may need to be woken tonight to use it.)

fields.name: Harlot
fields.desc1: Each night*, choose a living player:
fields.desc2: if they agree, you learn their character,
fields.night_other_desc: The Harlot points at any player. Then, put the Harlot to sleep. Wake the chosen player, show them the 'This character selected you' token, then the Harlot token. That player either nods their head yes or shakes their head no. If they nodded their head yes, wake the Harlot and show them the chosen player's character token. Then, you may decide that both players die.

fields.name: Barista
fields.desc1: Each night, until dusk, 1) A player becomes sober,
fields.desc2: healthy & gets true info, or 2)
fields.desc3: Their ability works twice. They learn which.
fields.night_first_desc: Choose a player, wake them and tell them which Barista power is affecting them. Treat them accordingly (sober/healthy/true info or activate their ability twice).
fields.night_other_desc: Choose a player, wake them and tell them which Barista power is affecting them. Treat them accordingly (sober/healthy/true info or activate their ability twice).

fields.name: Deviant
fields.desc1: If you were funny today,
fields.desc2: you cannot die by exile.

fields.name: Gangster
fields.desc1: Once per day, you may choose to kill
fields.desc2: an aliive neighbor, if your other alive neighbor agrees.

fields.name: Doomsayer
fields.desc1: If 4 or more players live, each living player may
fields.desc2: publicly choose (once per game) that
fields.desc3: a player of their own alignment dies.

fields.name: Angel
fields.desc1: Something bad might happen to whoever is most responsible
fields.desc2: for the death of a new player.

fields.name: Buddhist
fields.desc1: For the first 2 minutes of each day,
fields.desc2: veteran players may not talk.

fields.name: Hell's Librarian
fields.desc1: Something bad might happen to whoever talks
fields.desc2: when the Storyteller has asked for silence.

fields.name: Revolutionary
fields.desc1: 2 neighboring players are known to be the same alignment.
fields.desc2: Once per game, one of them registers falsely.

fields.name: Fiddler
fields.desc1: Once per game, the Demon secretly chooses
fields.desc2: an opposing player: all players choose

fields.name: Toymaker
fields.desc1: The Demon may choose not to attack
fields.desc2: & must do this at least once per game.
fields.desc3: Evil players get normal starting info.

fields.name: Fibbin
fields.desc1: Once per game, 1 good player
fields.desc2: might get incorrect information.

fields.name: Duchess
fields.desc1: Each day, 3 players may choose to visit you.
fields.desc2: At night*, each visitor learns how many
fields.desc3: visitors are evil, but 1 gets false info.

fields.name: Sentinel
fields.desc1: There might be 1 extra or
fields.desc2: 1 fewer Outsider in play.

fields.name: Spirit of Ivory
fields.desc1: There can't be more than 1 extra evil player.

fields.name: Djinn
fields.desc1: Use the Djinn's special rule.
fields.desc2: All players know what it is.

fields.name: Storm Catcher
fields.desc1: Name a good character. If in play, they can only
fields.desc2: die by execution, but evil players

fields.name: Fearmonger
fields.desc1: Each night, choose a player: if you nominate
fields.desc2: & execute them, their team loses.
fields.desc3: All players know if you choose a new player.
fields.night_first_desc: The Fearmonger points to a player. Place the Fear token next to that player and announce that a new player has been selected with the Fearmonger ability.
fields.night_other_desc: The Fearmonger points to a player. If different from the previous night, place the Fear token next to that player and announce that a new player has been selected with the Fearmonger ability.

fields.name: Demon Info
fields.desc1: Demon info
fields.night_first_desc: If 7 or more players: wake up the Demon. Show the 'These are your minions' card. Point to each Minion. Show the 'This is the Demon' card. Show 3 character tokens of Good characters that are not in play.

fields.name: Minion Info
fields.desc1: Minion Info
fields.night_first_desc: If 7 or more players: wake up all of the Minions. They make eye contact with each other. Show the 'This is the Demon' card. Point to the Demon.

fields.name: Dawn
fields.desc1: Dawn
fields.night_first_desc: Wait approximately 10 seconds. Call for eyes open, then immediately announce which players (if any)  died.
fields.night_other_desc: Wait approximately 10 seconds. Call for eyes open, then immediately announce which players (if any) died.
